sentences.en: A change of scenery might do you the power of good.
sentences.cn: 换个地方或许对你大有裨益。

sentences.en: Every bit of Huangshan Mountain scenery is worth painting.
sentences.cn: 黄山山景,处处可以入画.

sentences.en: Guilin is known throughout the world for its scenery.
I prowled around the lake admiring the beautiful scenery.
sentences.cn: 我在湖边徘徊,欣赏美丽的景色.

sentences.en: Instead of stagehands, the actors will move the scenery right in front of the audience.
sentences.cn: 演员们将替代舞台工作人员，当着观众的面置换布景。

sentences.en: Lash the scenery up ready for the next act.
sentences.cn: 用绳子把布景固定住,准备演下一场.

sentences.en: Sometimes they just drive slowly down the lane enjoying the scenery.
sentences.cn: 有时他们只是沿着小路慢慢地开车，欣赏两旁的风景。

sentences.en: The best part of the trip was the fantastic scenery.
sentences.cn: 此次旅行最精彩之处就是那美妙绝伦的风景。

sentences.en: The flowers were colourful and the scenery magnificent.
sentences.cn: 花儿五颜六色，景色蔚为壮观。

sentences.en: The higher we climbed, the more awe-inspiring the scenery became.
sentences.cn: 我们爬得越高，风景越是让人叹绝。

sentences.en: The island offers such a wide variety of scenery and wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这个岛屿拥有丰富多样的景致及种类繁多的野生动植物。

sentences.en: The passengers were enthralled by the scenery.
The scenery for the play must have cost too much.
sentences.cn: 那出戏的舞台布景一定很费钱.

sentences.en: The tranquil beauty of the village scenery is unique.
sentences.cn: 这乡村景色的宁静是绝无仅有的.

sentences.en: These houses seem to blend into the surrounding scenery.
sentences.cn: 这些房屋似乎与周围的景色融为一体了.

sentences.en: Whoever passes here would stop to admire the scenery.
sentences.cn: 但凡过路的人,都要停下一览这儿的风光.

words.tran_cn: 风景优美的；舞台的；戏剧的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主美)（演员）表演过火，夸张表演

trans.tran_en: the natural features of a particular part of a country that you can see, such as mountains, forests, deserts etc
